relationships.power_balance: She has institutional power and education, he has lived experience and the money
relationships.core_tension: She wants to study without interfering, he wants to prove a point, gradually becomes partnership
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Anonymous collaboration. Book 2: Working together, intellectual connection. Book 3: Love and true partnership in final days

relationships.power_balance: He has resources, they have gratitude and visibility as subject
relationships.core_tension: He wants anonymity, they want to thank him, media makes them the face of experiment
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Don't interact. Book 2: Brief meeting. Book 3: Yuki speaks at his memorial, tells his true story

relationships.power_balance: Harris has all institutional power, Reed has truth
relationships.core_tension: Reed's experiment proves Harris's worldview is wrong
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Harris unaware. Book 2: Harris fascinated then threatened. Book 3: Harris offers him everything to stop, Reed refuses

relationships.core_tension: Marcus sees Reed's potential before Reed does
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Drug trade relationship becomes friendship. Book 2: Marcus helps him see meaning in the work. Book 3: Marcus speaks at his memorial

relationships.power_balance: He controls resources, she controls findings
relationships.core_tension: He wants positive research supporting the system, she's finding the opposite
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Professional. Book 2: Tension as her findings critique system. Book 3: She publishes despite his pressure, burns that bridge

relationships.power_balance: Amara has institutional position, Yuki has authenticity
relationships.core_tension: Ethics of studying people's suffering for career advancement
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Professional interview. Book 2: Genuine friendship as Amara stops just observing. Book 3: Yuki helps Amara write the book humanely

relationships.power_balance: Equal in circumstance, Marcus has experience
relationships.core_tension: Yuki's anxiety vs. Marcus's patience, teaching relationship
relationships.evolution: Book 1: Neighbors. Book 2: Marcus teaches Yuki to slow down and live. Book 3: Yuki caring for aging Marcus, role reversal

relationships.initial_dynamic: Invisible worker and executive who never sees workers
relationships.power_balance: Complete imbalance - Marcus is nothing to Harris
relationships.core_tension: Marcus's body is destroyed by policies Harris approved without thought
relationships.evolution: Book 1: No interaction. Book 2: Marcus interviewed for media about experiment, Harris sees him as 'ungrateful'. Book 3: Harris finally understands what his policies did, but too late
